name: Styles

aliases.name: GapConfig
aliases.comment: Config type for defining inner / outer gaps for elements.
aliases.type: { inner : Styles.Length.Length , innerTop : Styles.Length.Length , innerRight : Styles.Length.Length , innerBottom : Styles.Length.Length , innerLeft : Styles.Length.Length , outer : Styles.Length.Length , outerTop : Styles.Length.Length , outerRight : Styles.Length.Length , outerBottom : Styles.Length.Length , outerLeft : Styles.Length.Length }

aliases.name: PositionConfig
aliases.type: { top : Styles.Length.Length , right : Styles.Length.Length , bottom : Styles.Length.Length , left : Styles.Length.Length }

values.name: absolute
values.comment: Set position as absolute and pass position config

values.name: autoGrid
values.comment:
Create a grid with given number auto-sized columns. It's equivalent of;

        grid { defaultGrid | columns = Length.repeat n Length.auto }

values.name: box
values.comment: Create a new box element with given config

values.name: center
values.comment: Centers inside the content.

values.name: circle
cover
values.comment: Set given background image as cover

values.name: debug
values.comment: Shows 8px debug grid as a background.

values.name: debug16
values.comment: Shows 16px debug grid as a background.

values.name: defaultBox
values.comment: Default box config

values.name: defaultFlex
values.comment: Default flex box config

values.name: defaultGap
values.comment: Default gap config

values.name: defaultGrid
values.comment: Default Grid.Config

values.name: defaultPosition
values.comment: Default position config

values.name: defaultTypo
values.comment: Default typography config

values.name: easein
values.comment: Add easein transition to all properties

values.name: easeout
values.comment: Add easeout transition to all properties

values.name: equalGrid
values.comment:
Shortcut for creating a grid with given number equal-sized columns. It's equivalent of;

        grid { defaultGrid | columns = Length.repeat n (Length.fr 1) }

values.name: fixed
values.comment: Set position as fixed and pass position config

values.name: flex
values.comment: Create a new element with flex display

values.name: fullscreen
values.comment: Make the element stretch to the visible part of the screen.

values.name: gap
values.comment: Set inner (padding) and outer (margin) gap.

values.name: grid
maxWidth
values.type: Float -> List Css.Style -> List Css.Style -> List Css.Style

values.name: minWidth
values.type: Float -> List Css.Style -> List Css.Style -> List Css.Style

values.name: monospace
values.comment: Set typography as monospace, proxying other typography options

values.name: noborder
values.comment: Remove the borders

values.name: nooutline
values.comment: Remove the outlines

values.name: position
values.comment: Set position properties "top" "left" "right" and "bottom"

values.name: rainbow
values.comment: Add rainbow effect to the text.

values.name: relative
values.comment: Set position as relative and pass position config

values.name: rounded
values.comment: Set border as rounded with given pixels

values.name: sans
values.comment: Set typography family as sans, proxying other typography options

values.name: serif
values.comment: Set typography family as serif, proxying other typography options

values.name: shadow
values.comment: Add shadow with specified opacity.

values.name: sticky
values.comment: Set position as sticky and pass position config

values.name: stretch
values.comment: Stretch the element to fill available horizontal and vertical space. In the other words, set the width / height to 100%.

values.name: toCSS
values.comment: Proxy function to `Html.Styled.Attributes.css`

values.name: transparentBg
values.comment: Shortcut for setting background as transparent

values.name: typography
values.comment: Set typography options

values.name: whitebg
values.comment: Shortcut for setting background color as white

values.name: whitefg
values.comment: Shortcut for setting text color as white

name: Styles.Typography

aliases.name: Config
aliases.comment: Config for setting typography and basic text properties
aliases.type: { family : List String , size : Styles.Length.Length , weight : Int , height : Styles.Length.Length , uppercase : Bool , lowercase : Bool , capitalize : Bool , ellipsis : Bool , letterSpacing : Styles.Length.Length , fg : Css.Color , bg : Css.Color }

values.name: css
values.comment: Return CSS properties for given typography config

values.name: defaultConfig
values.comment: Default typography config

name: Styles.Color

values.name: hex
values.comment: Define hex color

values.name: hsl
values.comment: Define hsl color

values.name: hsla
values.comment: Define hsla color

values.name: rgb
values.comment: Define rgb color

values.name: rgba
values.comment: Define rgba color

name: Styles.Box

aliases.name: Config
aliases.comment: Options for creating a new element.
aliases.type: { size : Styles.Length.Length , width : Styles.Length.Length , height : Styles.Length.Length , bg : Css.Color , fg : Css.Color , block : Bool , inline : Bool , inlineBlock : Bool , flex : Bool , alignContent : Styles.Align.Align , justifyContent : Styles.Align.Align , alignItems : Styles.Align.Align , justifyItems : Styles.Align.Align }

values.name: css
values.comment: Return CSS properties for given config

values.name: defaultConfig
values.comment: Default box config

name: Styles.Border

types.name: Border
types.comment: Union type for specifying border size, color and style.

name: Styles.Length

types.name: Length
types.comment: Union type for all kinds of lengths

values.name: around
values.comment: Alias function for constructing list of lengths

values.name: auto
values.comment: Returns Auto

values.name: autofill
values.comment: Alias function for auto-fill

values.name: autofit
values.comment: Alias function for auto-fit

values.name: columns
values.comment: Alias function for constructing list of lengths

values.name: em
values.comment: Returns an em length for given number

values.name: fr
values.comment: Returns an fr length for given number

values.name: len
values.comment: Alias function for constructing list of lengths

values.name: minmax
values.comment: Alias function for constructing minmax(, ...)

values.name: pct
values.comment: Returns an percent length for given number

values.name: px
values.comment: Returns an pixels length for given number

values.name: rem
values.comment: Returns an rem length for given number

values.name: repeat
values.comment: Repeat two lengths

values.name: repeatN
values.comment: Returns repeat of given length.

values.name: rows
values.comment: Alias function for constructing list of lengths

values.name: stringify
values.comment:
Stringifies given length.

      > stringify (em 1)
      "1em"

      > stringify (columns [1em, auto, 1em])
      "1em auto 1em"

values.name: unset
values.comment: Marks the property as unset

values.name: vh
values.comment: Returns vh length for given number.
